##  Trivia 

* Despite being listed as such, Serafen's Padded Mail is not a unique and is simply a [Fine Mail Armor](/fineMailArmorDeadfire/) with a different model and icon.
* Along with [Xoti](/xoti/) and her armor the [Vestments of Gaun](/vestmentsOfGaun/), [Serafen](/serafen/) is one of the only two companions in the game that start with armor that cannot be enchanted (not including sidekicks).
